name: DrawTective
description:
DrawTective is a couch co-op game where two players try to find the theif in a crowd of business men! Work together to find the criminal with the exact drawing that the two players draw together!

Player 1:
- Use WASD and the ARROW KEYS to walk around the town square!
- If you think you found the culprit, use SPACEBAR to arrest him!
Player 2:
- Use the MOUSE to draw the culprit described by the victim!

Find the criminal before time runs out! If you guess the wrong person, you lose time to catch him, so make every guess count!

Credits:

A Game Made By Cheemis

Music By Koyota

Cartoon Low Poly City Pack By JustCreate https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/urban/cartoon-low-poly-cit...

Cubic People vs Zombies By Pxltiger
